definition: horse/CL:匹[pi3]/horse or cavalry piece in Chinese chess/knight in Western chess
surname Ma/abbr. for Malaysia 馬來西亞|马来西亚[Ma3 lai2 xi1 ya4]
to pull/to play (a bowed instrument)/to drag/to draw/to chat
to compete/competition/match/to surpass/better than/superior to/to excel

sentences.english: He romped home in the marathon race.
sentences.chinese: 他在馬拉松賽跑中輕而易舉地獲勝。

sentences.english: Let's say, your brother just ran a marathon.
sentences.chinese: 假設你的哥哥參加了一場馬拉松賽跑。

sentences.english: I'm you the Hilltop School Skating Marathon.
sentences.chinese: 我是在高山學校溜冰馬拉松賽的現場向您報道。

sentences.english: It is said that people can see some marathons in ChangbaiMountains every year.
sentences.chinese: 據說人們每年在常白山能看到一些馬拉松賽。

sentences.english: Why do the vast majority of people who start the marathon complete it?
sentences.chinese: 爲什麼大多數完成馬拉松賽的人們會這樣做呢？

sentences.english: He set up a new national record in the marathon race.
sentences.chinese: 他創造了馬拉松賽跑的全國新記錄。

sentences.english: This year she is in Xiamen Marathon in London after the end of the title.
sentences.chinese: 今年她就是在廈門馬拉松賽結束後再於倫敦折桂的。

sentences.english: Auntie Pasto's … great place to carbo-load before the marathon.
sentences.chinese: 這是馬拉松賽前吸收碳水化合物的好地方。

sentences.english: I used it to maintain muscle mass while training for the San Diego Marathon.
sentences.chinese: 我在備戰聖地亞哥馬拉松賽時用它來鍛鍊肌肉力量。

sentences.english: People lined the streets to watch marathon.
sentences.chinese: 人們夾道觀看馬拉松賽跑。

sentences.english: He has taken part in long-distance cycle races and run several marathons .
sentences.chinese: 他曾參加過遠程自行車賽和好幾個馬拉松賽。

definition: Mingjian or Mingchien township in Nantou county 南投縣|南投县[Nan2 tou2 xian4], central Taiwan
Liupanshui prefecture-level city in west Guizhou 貴州|贵州[Gui4 zhou1]
to deliver (a diploma, licence etc)/to qualify
National Games, Chinese athletics competition, organized every four years since 1959
Ever Victorious Army (1860-1864), Qing dynasty army equipped and trained jointly with Europeans and used esp. against the Taiping rebels
Hong Kong Wetland Park, in Yuen Long, New Territories
pinyin: Xiang1 gang3 Shi1 di4 Gong1 yuan2

definition: ultramarathon/abbr. for 超級馬拉松|超级马拉松[chao1 ji2 ma3 la1 song1]
